user.name: Nosa Obaseki
user.title: Front-end Developer
user.bio: I am vastly experienced in implementing pixel perfect UI designs from PSD or Sketch files to HTML5 design Prototypes (HTML5, CSS, JAVASCRIPT) coupled with using Vue.js to build Single Page Applications. I have great experience working with Vue.js as I have built a couple of Large scale applications with it. I also works with source control tools such as GIT to collaborate with other developers and I use BEM Methodology to create reusable front end code. I also write technical articles teaching concepts / technologies I know on Medium
